coffees.name: AFFOGATO
coffees.description: Espresso poured on a vanilla ice cream. Served in a cappuccino cup.

coffees.name: ESPRESSO AMERICANO
coffees.description: Espresso with added hot water. Often served in a cappuccino cup. The espresso is added into the hot water rather than all the water being flowed.

coffees.name: CAFFÈ LATTE
coffees.description: A tall, mild 'milk coffee'. An espresso with steamed milk and only a little milk foam poured over it. Serve in a latte glass or a coffee cup. Flavoured syrup can be added.

coffees.name: CAFFÈ MOCHA
coffees.description: A caffè latte with chocolate and whipped cream, made by pouring about 2 cl of chocolate sauce into the glass, followed by an espresso shot and steamed milk.

coffees.name: CAFÈ AU LAIT
coffees.description: French morning coffee. Made by mixing dark roasted filter coffee (often prepared with French Press) and warm milk. Served in a bowl or a large coffee cup.

coffees.name: CAPPUCCINO
coffees.description: A coffee drink consisting of espresso and a milk foam mixture (drink size about 160–240 ml). Served in a cappuccino cup.

coffees.name: COLD BREW COFFEE
coffees.description: Cold Brew Coffee is a smooth, cold beverage prepared by brewing freshly ground coffee in cold water. In the Cold Brew process, time makes up for heat.

coffees.name: DOUBLE ESPRESSO
coffees.description: Double portion of espresso in a cappuccino/espresso cup.

coffees.name: ESPRESSO
coffees.description: A short, strong drink (about 30 ml) served in an espresso cup.

coffees.name: ESPRESSO CON PANNA
coffees.description: A shot of espresso topped with whipped cream. Served in an espresso cup.

coffees.name: ESPRESSO MACCHIATO
coffees.description: Espresso with a little milk foam (drink size about 50 ml). Served in an espresso cup.

coffees.name: FLAT WHITE
coffees.description: A coffee drink with a double espresso and lightly frosted milk (About 150–240 ml). Served in a glass.

coffees.name: FRAPPÉ
coffees.description: Rich iced coffee made of espresso, milk and ice. Flavoured syrup can be added (about 300 ml). Mixed in a blender and served for example in a latte glass.

coffees.name: FREAKSHAKE
coffees.description: Basically anything that is blended/mixed/stirred and served with various topping that are very 'instagrammable'. Coffee Freakshakes are often made with cold brew coffee.

coffees.name: ICED LATTE
coffees.description: Ice, cold milk and an espresso in a latte glass (about 300 ml), often mixed with some sugar or flavoured syrup. Served in a latte glass.

coffees.name: ICED MOCHA
coffees.description: Cold Caffè mocha. Prepared like iced latte, but garnished and flavoured like caffè mocha (about 300 ml). Served in a latte glass.

coffees.name: IRISH COFFEE
coffees.description: Classic coffee coctail where Irish whiskey is mixed with filter coffee and topped with thin layer of gently whipped cream.

coffees.name: LATTE MACCHIATO
coffees.description: Like a traditional caffè latte, but with a thicker layer of foam. Often made by pouring an espresso last into the milk (drink size about 300 ml). Served in a latte glass.

coffees.name: LUNGO
coffees.description: An espresso pulled long (50–60 ml). Served in an espresso/cappuccino cup.

coffees.name: RISTRETTO
coffees.description: A very short shot of espresso (about 20 ml). Served in an espresso cup.
